NK121(ko)002:5206: rnam thar gsum po sgom pa'ang bdud kyi las yin gzugs nyid stong pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5207: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5208: 'di ltar rnam par thar pa'i sgo'i ting nge 'dzin sgom pa na /
NK121(ko)002:5214: rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dngos pos dben pa'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK121(ko)002:5215: de bzhin du mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhi ba'i mtshan nyid dang /
NK121(ko)002:5216: smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin sdug bsngal sel ba'i mtshan nyid rnams bsgom mo //
NK121(ko)002:5218: blang dor gyi mthar lhung bas chos mnyam pa nyid
NK121(ko)002:5219: kyi blo skye ba'i bar du gcod pa'i phyir bdud
NK121(ko)002:5221: 'o na ji ltar bya zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:5224: mi mthun pa dang gnyen po dbyer med par rtogs pas /
NK121(ko)002:5225: thabs la mkhas pa'i rnam par thar pa zhes kyang bya /
NK121(ko)002:5226: mi mthun pa la spang bar bya ba'i rdzas med par rtogs pas /
NK121(ko)002:5227: rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par thar pa zhes kyang bya /
NK121(ko)002:5228: thams cad du rang gi ngo bo grub pa med par rtogs pas /
NK121(ko)002:5229: mngon par 'dus ma byas pa'i rnam par thar pa zhes bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5230: 'di lta bu'i don gyis zin par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5233: 'khor ba'i lam gsum spong zhing mya ngan 'das lam sgom pa'ang bdud kyi las nyid de /
NK121(ko)002:5234: de nyid rang bzhin ma zhi rang bzhin btsal spangs gar mi gnas //
NK121(ko)002:5236: 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug gsum 'khor ba'i lam du mthong nas spong zhing /
NK121(ko)002:5237: ma chags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba la sogs pa
NK121(ko)002:5238: mya ngan las 'das pa'i lam du mthong nas sgom
NK121(ko)002:5240: blang dor gyi mthar lhung bas bdud kyi las yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5241: des chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi zhi ba'i don ma mthong ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5242: gang gi phyir chos kyi rang bzhin ni brtsal spangs gnyis la gnas bcar med pa'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)002:5244: dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5245: rnam par grol ba ni 'dod chags dang zhe sdang
NK121(ko)002:5246: gti mug spangs pas rnam par grol ba ma yin
NK121(ko)002:5248: 'dod chags dang zhe sdang dang gti mug spangs pas rnam par grol lo zhes zer ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5249: nga rgyal ba rnams kyi ste /
NK121(ko)002:5250: gang nga med pa rnams kyi ni 'dod chags dang
NK121(ko)002:5251: zhe sdang dang gti mug gi rang bzhin nyid rnam
NK121(ko)002:5253: zhes gsungs pa dang yang mthun no //
NK121(ko)002:5255: 'di ltar 'phags pa dgra bcom pa rnams ni /
NK121(ko)002:5256: bdag gis nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs so snyam du rlom sems yod na'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5258: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul yang de 'dra'o //
NK121(ko)002:5259: 'o na 'phags pa'i lam gyi dngos gzhi gang yin zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:5260: 'phags pa kun gyi yul dang gnas kyang 'das sogs lam nyid gzhan na med /
NK121(ko)002:5262: 'phags pa kun gyis gzigs pa'i yul dang grub pa'i gnas kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5263: chos mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa las gzhan med la /
NK121(ko)002:5264: mya ngan las 'das pa thob pa'i lam yang chos
NK121(ko)002:5265: mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa las gzhan med
NK121(ko)002:5266: de / de bas na ji srid du chos mnyam
NK121(ko)002:5267: pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pa rdeng
NK121(ko)002:5269: spang blang gi blo cha shas 'phra mo tsam yod pa de srid du /
NK121(ko)002:5270: thar pa'i bsti gnas tsam yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5271: lam gyi rang gi ngo bo ma yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5272: de bas na rgyal ba'i bka' rnams su lam 'di ma rtogs par lam gzhan gyis sangs mi rgya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5274: chos mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med pa'i don ma rtogs par sangs rgyas nyid mi 'thob pas /
NK121(ko)002:5275: de bas na dgongs pa thams cad kyi zhe phugs zhes zhes gsungs pa'i don yang de yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5276: tshul 'di ni sdong pos brgyan pa'i mdo las kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5277: gang zhig bdag dang sangs rgyas rnams //
NK121(ko)002:5278: rang bzhin mnyam par rab gnas shing //
NK121(ko)002:5279: mi gnas len pa med pa de //
NK121(ko)002:5280: de dag bde bar gshegs par 'gyur //
NK121(ko)002:5281: gzugs dang tshor ba 'du shes dang //
NK121(ko)002:5282: rnam par shes dang sems pa dag /
NK121(ko)002:5283: grangs med de bzhin gshegs pa rnams //
NK121(ko)002:5284: de dag thub pa chen por 'gyur //
NK121(ko)002:5285: zhes gsungs pa dang yang mthun no //
NK121(ko)002:5286: da ni byang chub kyi sems gom pa klong du
NK121(ko)002:5287: gyur cing rdeng du gyur nas sems la dbang thob
NK121(ko)002:5288: par gyur pa'i tshad cung zad bstan par bya ste
NK121(ko)002:5289: / de yang byang chub sems bsgom pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5290: ji srid yid kyi g.yo ba de srid bdud kyi yul te 'phra ba'i lam //
NK121(ko)002:5291: g.yo dang mi g.yo tha snyad mi gnas gnas la gnas pa med //
NK121(ko)002:5292: snang med dbu ma'i lam de byang chub sems zhes pa der gshegs gsungs //
NK121(ko)002:5294: 'di ltar snang rtog ci skye'ang ma bkag ste rang byung /
NK121(ko)002:5296: rtsol ba med par btang snyoms chen po'i ngang la yun ring du bzhag pa'i tshe /
NK121(ko)002:5297: nus pa cung zad rnyed pa na /
NK121(ko)002:5298: snang rtog rgyun du skye'ang dngos po dang mtshan ma'i zhen pa dang bral bar skye ste /
NK121(ko)002:5299: dper na rmi lam gyi don snang ba gnyid de bas bsrabs par gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:5300: snang ba ma log kyang dngos por lta ba dang
NK121(ko)002:5301: mtshan mar 'dzin pa'i zhen pa log pa lta bu'o
NK121(ko)002:5302: // de nas de bas kyang shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin las su rung ba na /
NK121(ko)002:5303: mtshan mar 'dzin pa phra ba tsam du ma zad kyi /
NK121(ko)002:5304: skye ba nyid kyang phra bar 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:5305: dper na rmi lam na gnyid cher bsrabs par gyur
NK121(ko)002:5306: pa na zhen pa log pa tsam du ma zad
NK121(ko)002:5307: kyi / snang ba nyid kyang phra bar snang ba lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:5308: de nas shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin shin tu dbang du gyur pa na /
NK121(ko)002:5309: yid kyi g.yo ba'i 'du byed nyams su myong ba snyam byed pa'am /
NK121(ko)002:5310: mi g.yo bar nyams su myong ba snyam byed pa'am /
NK121(ko)002:5311: de gnyis kyi tha snyad las 'das par nyams su myong ba yang med de /
NK121(ko)002:5312: de bas na snang med dbu ma'i lam zhes bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5313: de lta bu'i dus na nyams su myong ba'am /
NK121(ko)002:5314: 'gags nas de lta bu zhig nyams su myong bar shes pa'am /
NK121(ko)002:5315: de lta bu'i tshor ba'i snang ba gnyis dang yang bral la /
NK121(ko)002:5316: 'du shes kyis don 'di lta bu zhig go //
NK121(ko)002:5317: zhes tha snyad gdags su rung ba'i snang ba dang bral ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5318: snang med dbu ma'i lam zhes bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5319: tshul 'di nyid matha'i mun sel sgron ma las kyang gsungs pa /
NK121(ko)002:5320: ji tsam rtog med zab mo zhig /
NK121(ko)002:5321: blo yi yul du snang zhe na //
NK121(ko)002:5322: mi rtog zab mo'i nyams myong ba //
NK121(ko)002:5323: myong ba yin phyir de nyid min //
NK121(ko)002:5325: dus gang gi tshe rnam par mi rtog pa'i don
NK121(ko)002:5326: zab mo gzhan la bstan pa'i thabs med pa zhig
NK121(ko)002:5327: / rang gi blos nyams su myong ngo zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:5328: de lta na yang nyams su myong ba nyid kyi phyir rtog pa zhig tu zad pas /
NK121(ko)002:5329: bden pa mthong ba zhes mi bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5330: 'di ltar rang gis myong ba gzhan la bstan par
NK121(ko)002:5331: mi nus pa ni mngon sum kun gyi chos nyid
NK121(ko)002:5332: yin te / dper na lan tsh+wa'i ro ni mi
NK121(ko)002:5333: dang dud 'gro phal mo ches kyang thun mong du
NK121(ko)002:5334: nyams su myong ba yin mod kyi /
NK121(ko)002:5335: 'on kyang lan tsh+wa'i ro ma myong ba zhig la /
NK121(ko)002:5337: zhes bstan pa'i thabs ni med do //
NK121(ko)002:5338: de bzhin du rang la ting nge 'dzin gyi ro myong ba yod na /
NK121(ko)002:5339: gzhan la bstan par mi nus kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5340: zab mo'i grangs su mi chud de rnam par rtog pa zhig tu zad do //
NK121(ko)002:5341: tshul 'di ni gzhan las kyang gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5342: tshor bral bde ba'i lam zhes kyang gsungs la /
NK121(ko)002:5343: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang tshor ba dang
NK121(ko)002:5344: bral zhing yid kyi spyod pa dang bral bar gsungs
NK121(ko)002:5345: te / dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5346: thub dbang khyod kyis bdud dpung stobs can rab btul nas //
NK121(ko)002:5347: byang chub mchog rab zhi ba mi 'chi bde ba brnyes //
NK121(ko)002:5348: de la tshor byed sems dang yid kyi spyod pa med //
NK121(ko)002:5350: 'di ni byang chub brnyes pa'i skabs su gsungs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5351: sangs rgyas kyi dgongs par 'di dang bden pa mthong ba'i bye khyad par brag ni /
NK121(ko)002:5352: shes pa tshogs brgyad du smra ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:5353: gcig pur smra ba'i bye brag gis cung zad tha dad par bzhag pa'ang yod na /
NK121(ko)002:5354: mdor bsdu na snang rtog mngon du rgyu log pa ni bden pa mthong ba'o //
NK121(ko)002:5355: bag la nyal zad pa ni byang chub nyid brnyes pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5356: bden pa mthong ba zhes bya ba 'adi'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5357: chos gang yang ma mthong ba'i tshig bla dwags te /
NK121(ko)002:5358: ji skad du dri ma med par grags pas bstan pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5359: bden pa mthong ba rnams kyis kyang bden pa nyid mthong ba med na /
NK121(ko)002:5360: brdzun pa lta ga la mthong /
NK121(ko)002:5362: sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa nam mkha' mthong zhes sems can tshig tu rab brjod pa /
NK121(ko)002:5363: nam mkha' ji ltar mthong ste don 'di brtag par gyis //
NK121(ko)002:5364: de bzhin chos mthong ba'ang de bzhin gshegs pas bstan //
NK121(ko)002:5366: yongs ni bden pa mthong ba rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin rnam par rtog pa dang bral ba la /
NK121(ko)002:5367: de de bzhin gshegs pa dang khyad par med pa skad du 'byung ba'ang yod na /
NK121(ko)002:5368: 'on kyang bag la nyal zhes bya ba'i sgra'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5369: rtog pa 'phra bas ma tshor ba tsam la bya'i /
NK121(ko)002:5370: rtog pa gzhi nas mi g.yo ba la ni mi bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5371: a nu sha ya zhes bya ba'i ming chu srin chu bya'i grib ma snyegs pa'i ming ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5372: grib ma zhes bya ba ni gzugs brnyan gyi ming ste /
NK121(ko)002:5373: rgya mtsho chen po'i steng gi bar snang la bya
NK121(ko)002:5374: 'phur ba'i gzugs brnyan rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas pa
NK121(ko)002:5375: / chu srin gyis snyegs pa na byas ma tshor ba la /
NK121(ko)002:5376: a nu sha ya zhes zer te /
NK121(ko)002:5377: mdo sde'i skabs su bag la nyal zhes btags /
NK121(ko)002:5378: chos mngon pa'i skabs su phra rgyas zhes btags /
NK121(ko)002:5379: de nas bya chu bya'i steng du babs pa na gzugs brnyan dang bya lhan cig gyur pa'i tshe /
NK121(ko)002:5380: chu srin bya nyid la snyegs pa byas mngon du tshor ba na /
NK121(ko)002:5381: pa d+yud tha na zhes bya ste kun nas ldang ba zhes bya bar btags par zad de /
NK121(ko)002:5382: dngos su rtog pa 'phra rags su rgyu ba nyams su tshor ba dang ma tshor ba las /
NK121(ko)002:5383: mngon du rgyu dang bag la nyal zhes btags par zad de /
NK121(ko)002:5384: gzhi mi g.yo ba ni ma yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5385: tshul 'di ni mdo sde las kyang gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5386: blo gros rgya mtshos zhus pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5387: blo gros rgya mtsho chen po rgyang ma nas bltas
NK121(ko)002:5388: na shin tu mi g.yo bar snang ba de ni
NK121(ko)002:5389: / drung du thug na mi g.yo ba ma yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5390: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ting
NK121(ko)002:5391: nge 'dzin gang shin tu mi g.yo bar snang ba
NK121(ko)002:5392: de ni / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi
NK121(ko)002:5393: spyan gyis gzigs na mi g.yo ba ma yin no
NK121(ko)002:5395: gzhan yang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i rang gi ngo bo yang /
NK121(ko)002:5396: mnyam bzhag gi dus na sems gnas pa thob pa na /
NK121(ko)002:5397: rtog pa phra ba yod pa ma tshor ba la gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5399: byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes bya'i sgrib pa gang zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:5400: sems gnas pa de ni de bzhin nyid ma yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5401: de ni chu ma mgyogs pa dang 'dra ste rgyang
NK121(ko)002:5402: ma nas bltas na gnas par snang yang mi 'bab
NK121(ko)002:5404: de ni mchog tu phra ba'i snying po rtog pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5407: gnas pa bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis /
NK121(ko)002:5408: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mthong ni mthong gi legs par ma mthong ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5409: dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs bskyed pas bye brag phyed par mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:5411: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mthong ma mthong zhes
NK121(ko)002:5412: bya ba 'di yang mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi
NK121(ko)002:5413: rang bzhin gyi dbang yin par zad de /
NK121(ko)002:5414: dag pa 'jig rten pa'i ye shes kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin mthong /
NK121(ko)002:5415: zhes tha snyad su'ang mi 'dogs so //
NK121(ko)002:5416: yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa las kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5417: nyan thos rnams ni zhi gnas kyi shas che la lhag mthong gi shas chung bas /
NK121(ko)002:5418: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin ma mthong ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5419: byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni zhi gnas kyi shas chung la lhag mthong gi shas che bas /
NK121(ko)002:5420: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin legs par ma mthong ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5421: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel bas legs par gzigs so //
NK121(ko)002:5422: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul yang de 'dra'o //
NK121(ko)002:5423: de bas na gsang sngags kyi tshul las /
NK121(ko)002:5424: snang rtog chos nyid du shes par bya ba ma gtogs pa /
NK121(ko)002:5425: ma skyes mi g.yo bsgom pa rnams /
NK121(ko)002:5426: sems mi g.yo mi rtog par gzhag zer ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5427: rtog pa nyid la chags su zad de /
NK121(ko)002:5428: nam sangs ma rgyas kyi bar du mi rtog pa'i dbyings su chud mi srid do //
NK121(ko)002:5430: de bas na sems nyams su len pa'i tshad bstan pa 'di yang /
NK121(ko)002:5431: snang rtog mngon du rgyu log pa tsam re shig tshad bzhag par zad de /
NK121(ko)002:5432: snang rtog gi zhen pa log par tshor ba nyid byang chub sems kyi drod thob pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5433: da ni drod kyi rtags cung zad bstan par bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5434: de yang byang chub sems bsgom pa las 'di skad du /
NK121(ko)002:5435: ched du rtsol bral yid la mi byed cis kyang mi 'khrugs mnyam shes dang //
NK121(ko)002:5436: gang la'ang chags dang yul gyis myos skrag med de mi 'bral mi gnas shing //
NK121(ko)002:5437: mi 'khrugs mnyam shes bzhi po phyogs dang pha rol phyin rnams der shes te //
NK121(ko)002:5439: gong du bstan pa ltar bsgoms te goms pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5441: gang gi tshe ting nge 'dzin las langs pa'i dus na'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5442: yul gyi rnam pa gang snang yang /
NK121(ko)002:5443: dngos por ma zhen pa'i stobs kyis /
NK121(ko)002:5444: yid du 'ong ba snang yang chags shing 'dod pa'i sems mi skye /
NK121(ko)002:5445: yid du mi 'ong ba snang yang skrag cing mi 'dod pa'i sems kyang mi skye /
NK121(ko)002:5446: mngon sum gyi stobs kyis dngos por snang yang mi
NK121(ko)002:5447: lta zhing mngon sum gyis rmongs par gyur pa med
NK121(ko)002:5448: de / 'bral ba'i blo dang gnas pa'i blo mi skye na'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5449: byang chub kyi sems goms pa'i rtags yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5450: gzhan yang lam dang 'bras bur bcas pa'i chos phyogs dang /
NK121(ko)002:5451: pha rol tu phyin pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5452: ye shes chen pos bsdus pa thams cad kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5453: chos gnyis su med pa'i don rtogs pa las gzhan med pa'i blo 'byung ste /
NK121(ko)002:5454: de'i tshe'ang byang chub kyi sems goms pa'i rtags thob pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5455: de ltar rtogs na lam mang po la sbyang mi dgos te /
NK121(ko)002:5456: rang gi sems kyi rang bzhin ji lta ba bzhin
NK121(ko)002:5457: rtogs shing goms par byas pa kho na ma nor
NK121(ko)002:5459: sems kyi dbyings su bsgom pas lam gyi gzhan du bsgoms pas 'od gsal mi 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:5461: rdo rje sems dpar bsgoms pas lam kun ma nor bsgoms pa yin //
NK121(ko)002:5463: da ni byang chub sems kyi yon tan cung zad tsam bshad de /
NK121(ko)002:5464: gang gi phyir theg pa 'og ma'i tshul dag las /
NK121(ko)002:5465: dang po rigs dang bshes gnyen gyi stobs kyis smon pa'i sems bskyed pas /
NK121(ko)002:5466: sems can thams cad bdag gir bzung ba'i snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis 'phangs te /
NK121(ko)002:5467: dkar po'i chos yongs su rdzogs par byas shing /
NK121(ko)002:5468: smon lam lhun gyis grub par mdzad pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5469: chos kyi sku brnyes pas na /
NK121(ko)002:5470: chos bsags pas na chos kyi sku zhes kyang bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5471: de'i dbang gis gzugs kyi rnam gnyis kyi mdzad pa rgyun mi 'chad do //
NK121(ko)002:5473: gsang sngags kyi tshul kha cig las /
NK121(ko)002:5474: rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du 'bras bu 'byung bas /
NK121(ko)002:5475: dang po nyid nas snying rje chen po'i mthus bslang ste /
NK121(ko)002:5476: sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa nyams su blangs nas /
NK121(ko)002:5477: gzugs kyi sku rnam gnyis bsgoms te /
NK121(ko)002:5478: sems can gyi don bya ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:5479: de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i sgo nas /
NK121(ko)002:5480: bsod nams kyi tshogs chen po'ang spyod cing /
NK121(ko)002:5481: chos kyi dbyings phyin ci ma log pa'ang bsgoms pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5482: 'bras bu sku gsum gyi bdag nyid can gyi sangs rgyas nyid thob par 'dod pa'ang yod pas /
NK121(ko)002:5483: de'i phyir byang chub sems kyi yon tan ma bshad na skur ba'i gnas su 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)002:5484: de la theg pa 'og ma pa'i tshul las rgyu
NK121(ko)002:5485: 'bras kyi tshul de skad du bshad pa de dag
NK121(ko)002:5486: kyang / 'gro ba rnams la 'khrul pa snang bar
NK121(ko)002:5487: 'gyur ba'i rgyur bshad pa ni 'gal ba med de
NK121(ko)002:5488: kyang / / rgyu rkyen sgyu ma las 'bras bu sgyu mar snang ba 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
NK121(ko)002:5489: 'on kyang 'gro ba'i don du snang ba rnams kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5490: de dag kho na la rag las pa'ang ma yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5491: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul de dag bkag pa'ang med de /
NK121(ko)002:5492: thabs rgya mtsho bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i mthus /
NK121(ko)002:5493: snang ba rgya mtsho 'byung bar zad do //
NK121(ko)002:5494: 'on kyang sangs rgyas kyi yon tan thams cad ni /
NK121(ko)002:5495: byang chub sems kyi mthu las brtsal bas med par 'byung ste /
NK121(ko)002:5496: de yang rang bzhin dang mngon du gyur pa'i mathu'o //
NK121(ko)002:5498: byang chub snying por de ma thag /
NK121(ko)002:5500: snang ba rgya mtsho chen po bzhin //
NK121(ko)002:5501: mi rtog nam mkha'i mtha' ltar yangs //
NK121(ko)002:5503: 'di ltar byang chub kyi snying po'i don rtogs ma thag tu /
NK121(ko)002:5504: gzungs dang ting nge 'dzin dang stobs dang ma 'dres
NK121(ko)002:5505: pa la sogs pa che ba'i yon tan thams cad
NK121(ko)002:5506: kyang / rgya mtsho chen po ltar mi g.yo ba la byin rlabs 'byung la /
NK121(ko)002:5507: gdul bya la snang ba yang rgya mtsho ltar brtsal ba med par 'byung ste /
NK121(ko)002:5508: 'on kyang rnam par mi rtog cing nam mkha'i mtha' ltar khyab cing yangs so //
NK121(ko)002:5510: tshul 'di nyid rdo rje sems dpa' nam mkha' che las kyang gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5511: cho 'phrul chen po dka' ba min //
NK121(ko)002:5512: yon tan kun dang stobs kyi rnams //
NK121(ko)002:5513: ji bzhin rtogs pa 'phra ba yis //
NK121(ko)002:5514: de ma thag tu rang las 'byung //
NK121(ko)002:5515: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul yang de 'dra'o //
NK121(ko)002:5516: 'bras bu brtsal ba med par 'dod pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5517: nges pa'i don gyi mdo sde las kyang gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5519: bla med gsang chen gang gis 'di rtogs na //
NK121(ko)002:5520: brtsal med 'bras bu yin te der sangs rgyas //
NK121(ko)002:5521: zhes gsungs pa dang yang mthun no //
NK121(ko)002:5522: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i don mdzad pa'i tshul yang de nyid las /
NK121(ko)002:5523: rtog med mnyam nyid chos kyi sku //
NK121(ko)002:5524: gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra //
NK121(ko)002:5525: kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis //
NK121(ko)002:5526: a li k+aa li zab tu bstan //
NK121(ko)002:5528: chos kyi sku'i rang bzhin ni mi rtog cing mnyam pa nyid yin pas /
NK121(ko)002:5529: nam mkha' ltar kun la khyab bo //
NK121(ko)002:5530: de las ma g.yos bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi 'phrul pa thams cad kyang med pa ma yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5531: sgyu ma rtsed mo dang 'dra bar rol pas /
NK121(ko)002:5532: gzung bas mi zin chu zla 'dra //
NK121(ko)002:5534: de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis 'gro ba thams cad
NK121(ko)002:5535: kun tu bzang po'i rgyan la 'god par mdzad cing
NK121(ko)002:5536: / thabs dang shes rab kyi spyod pa zab mos grol bar mdzad pas /
NK121(ko)002:5537: kun tu bzang po'i rol pa yis //
NK121(ko)002:5538: +aa li k+aa li zab tu bstan //
NK121(ko)002:5540: +aa li k+aa li ni 'dir kun tu bzang po yin pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5541: kun tu bzang mo yin pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5542: gnyis su med pa yin pa'i don gyis /
NK121(ko)002:5543: sgyu ma'i 'jig rten sbyong zhing 'dul ba'i mdzad spyod ston pa yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5544: de la a thung ni thams cad ma skyes pa'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5545: +aa ring po ni thugs rje'i mdzad spyod rgyun mi 'chad pa'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5546: ka thung ni byed pa'i don te /
NK121(ko)002:5547: ye shes chen pos thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5548: k+aa ring po ni 'gro ba gnas nas gnas su bskyod par mdzad pa'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5550: la ya ti gri na zhes bya ste len cing 'dzin pa'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5551: gu gu ni gud du bshad na dbyibs kyi sgo nas /
NK121(ko)002:5552: i glang po che'i sna 'dra ba zhes bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5553: thugs rje chen pos 'gro ba mi gtong ba'i gzungs kyi don /
NK121(ko)002:5555: i stri ling ga zhes bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5556: shes rab chen po'i gzungs kyis chos thams cad 'dzin pa'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5557: la dang sbyar te bshad na /
NK121(ko)002:5558: thabs dang shes rab zab mo'i mdzad spyod la mnga' brnyes pa'i don to //
NK121(ko)002:5559: des don ji ltar mdzad pa'i tshul bstan pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5560: de ni a dang mdzes pa'i ta //
NK121(ko)002:5561: pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)002:5562: 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la //
NK121(ko)002:5563: sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung //
NK121(ko)002:5565: de la a ni a ring po ste /
NK121(ko)002:5566: thugs rje chen po'i mdzad spyod rgyu mi 'chad pa'i don /
NK121(ko)002:5567: mdzes pa'i ta ni mdzad spyod de /
NK121(ko)002:5568: mdzes par byed pa ni shes rab chen po dag
NK121(ko)002:5569: cing spros pa med pa'i ngang la gnas shing de
NK121(ko)002:5571: ta zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi rang bzhin zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzugs so //
NK121(ko)002:5572: ba zhes bya ba ni de gnyis kyi ngang du 'gro ba thams cad grol bar mdzad pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5573: de yang gud na yod pa ma yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5574: 'gro ba rnams kyi thun mong gi spyod pa 'di nyid yin mod kyi /
NK121(ko)002:5575: 'on kyang las 'phro dang skal bar ldan pa rnams la /
NK121(ko)002:5576: dbang po'i rim pa bzhin skyob par snang bar 'gyur la /
NK121(ko)002:5577: skal ba med pa rnams la ni snang bar yang mi 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:5578: de ltar mi snang yang thabs dang shes rab kyi
NK121(ko)002:5579: rang bzhin ni yan lag spros pa bzhin du thun
NK121(ko)002:5581: pa dang yan lag spros pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)002:5582: 'jig rten yongs kyi spyod yul la //
NK121(ko)002:5583: sangs rgyas gsung gi zab mo 'byung //
NK121(ko)002:5586: brtags na med la bzhag na legs pa 'byung ba che //
NK121(ko)002:5587: mngon sum mi snang chags pas cha lugs kun nas skong //
NK121(ko)002:5588: bdag dang gzhan du bral ba'i ston mkhan rin chen mdzod //
NK121(ko)002:5589: thams cad grub pa'i yul med bdag med snying rjer bstan //
NK121(ko)002:5591: yul phyir chags la yul la bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med //
NK121(ko)002:5592: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5593: byang chub kyi sems ni mngon du bya ba'i chos med kyang kun gyi dgos 'dod skong //
NK121(ko)002:5594: bdag dang gzhan du mi dmigs kyang bdag dang gzhan gyi don mthar phyin par mdzad /
NK121(ko)002:5595: grub par bya ba'i yul med kyang bdag med pa'i snying rje skye /
NK121(ko)002:5596: sems can gyi phyir thugs rjes chags kyang yongs bsngo ba'i dmigs pa med pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5597: bdag med pa'i snying rje zhe'o //
NK121(ko)002:5598: lta ba rin po che sgron ma las kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5599: shes rab gnas med chags pa'i rdul bral yang //
NK121(ko)002:5600: snying rjes sems can khams la skyo ba med //
NK121(ko)002:5602: thabs dang shes rab gsal ba'i sgron ma las //
NK121(ko)002:5603: sems can sangs rgyas bden par tshul gcig cing //
NK121(ko)002:5604: rang gi sems nyid sangs rgyas yin shes na //
NK121(ko)002:5605: gzhan nas bsgrub par bya ba ci yang med //
NK121(ko)002:5606: de lta bas na spang bar bya ba'ang med //
NK121(ko)002:5607: de lta bu yi chos kyi tshul rig nas //
NK121(ko)002:5608: ma rig rnams la snying rje yongs kyi skye //
NK121(ko)002:5609: snying rje skyes nas sgyu ma'i ting 'dzin gyis //
NK121(ko)002:5610: phan 'dogs thabs kyi spyod pa cir yang ston //
NK121(ko)002:5611: zhes gsungs pa'i tshul yang de 'dra'o //
NK121(ko)002:5612: mdor na chos mnyam pa nyid gnyis su med par rtogs pas /
NK121(ko)002:5613: snying rje chung bar mi 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:5614: sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' bzhin no //
NK121(ko)002:5615: dngos por lta bas snying rje che bar mi 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:5616: nyan thos dang so so'i skye bo bzhin no //
NK121(ko)002:5617: theg pa 'og ma'i tshul las smon lam dang bsgoms pa'i stobs las /
NK121(ko)002:5618: gzugs kyi sku'i yon tan 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:5620: las kyi stobs yin par zad kyi /
NK121(ko)002:5621: gnyis su med pa'i byang chub kyi sems kyi stobs ni ma yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5624: gsung dang rgyas la dmigs dang snang //
NK121(ko)002:5625: sgyu mkhan ri mo'i rnam pa bzhin //
NK121(ko)002:5629: dam pa chos kyi gsung rab la dmigs pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5630: sangs rgyas la dmigs pa'i mthu las /
NK121(ko)002:5631: che ba'i yon tan snang ba 'byung ba rnams kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5632: dper na sgyu ma'i rnam pa med bzhin du snang ba'am /
NK121(ko)002:5633: ri mo'i rnam pa gzhi mthon dman med bzhin /
NK121(ko)002:5634: mthon dman du snang ba rnams /
NK121(ko)002:5635: sgrib par byed pa'i rkyen zhig gi dbang las snang ba bzhin du /
NK121(ko)002:5636: dmigs pa dang bcas cing 'byung 'jug gi rtog pa dang bcas pa'i sgrib pas /
NK121(ko)002:5637: ye shes chen po bsgribs shing rmugs par byas pa'i dbang las /
NK121(ko)002:5638: yon tan gyi rnam pa lta bur snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:5639: 'on kyang byang chub sems kyi rang bzhin gyi yon tan ni ma yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5640: mang po brjod mi dgos te /
NK121(ko)002:5641: rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul la sangs rgyas kyi chos mi rdzogs pa'i nyes skyon med do //
NK121(ko)002:5642: rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung nyid bstan pa'i skabs te /
NK121(ko)002:5644: da ni rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul la ji lta
NK121(ko)002:5645: ba bzhin du gnas par mi nus pa rnams la
NK121(ko)002:5646: / rtsol ba dang bcas pa'i thabs kyis lam btsal ba bstan par bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:5647: de yang rdzogs pa chen po'i lta bas zin par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5648: gang gi phyir byang chub kyi sems bde ba chen po ni chos kyi rtsa ba yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5649: 'ching ba'i nad thams cad 'byin par byed pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5651: byang chub kyi sems bsgom pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5652: kun tu bzang mos ma zin dge ba'i chos ni gang yang rung /
NK121(ko)002:5653: kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'ang bdud kyi las te zad cing mthar thug 'gyur /
NK121(ko)002:5654: de dang ldan pa'i las ni bdud kyi las kyang byang chub spyod par gsungs /
NK121(ko)002:5655: zhes gsungs pa lta bu yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5656: de la sems bcos pa'i thabs kyang /
NK121(ko)002:5657: pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul dang /
NK121(ko)002:5658: gsang sngags kyi tshul las sgo mang du snang ste /
NK121(ko)002:5659: 'di ltar bsam gtan gyi skyon drug spangs shing sgrib
NK121(ko)002:5660: bcu bsal ba'i bsam gtan ni thar pa'i lam mo
NK121(ko)002:5662: nyes pa lnga spong pa'i 'du byed brgyad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni thar pa'i lam mo //
NK121(ko)002:5664: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi chos la /
NK121(ko)002:5665: bzung btags bkag phye bcom pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni thar pa'i lam mo //
NK121(ko)002:5667: sems rang bzhin gyis gdul bar dka' ba'i chos drug
NK121(ko)002:5668: btul ba'i bzlas brjod dang bsam gtan ni thar pa'i
NK121(ko)002:5670: lus sems lha dang gsum la dmigs pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni thar pa'i lam mo //
NK121(ko)002:5673: sems bcos pa'i thabs mang du gsungs pa'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5674: thams cad mthong bar yang mi nus la /
NK121(ko)002:5675: bstan par yang mi nus pas re shig 'di dag tsam bshad do //
NK121(ko)002:5677: gang zag mos pa'i dbang gis 'jug pa so so yang 'byung la /
NK121(ko)002:5678: phan tshun gcig la gcig phan 'dogs pa'ang 'byung bas 'di dag tsam bshad do //
NK121(ko)002:5679: de la bsam gtan gyi skyon drug ni /
NK121(ko)002:5680: byung tshor dbang gis g.yeng ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:5681: bying rmugs dbang gis 'thibs pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5682: ther zug dbang gis 'thas pa gsum ni /
NK121(ko)002:5683: zhi gnas las su ma rung ba'i skyon yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5684: de la snga ma gnyis ni dper na mar me
NK121(ko)002:5685: phyi rol gyi rlung gis bskyod na yang mi gsal
NK121(ko)002:5686: / rang gi nye bar len pa'i rlung bkag na'ang /
NK121(ko)002:5687: 'chi ba'am 'chi ba la thug par gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:5688: de bzhin du sems gnas pa ni 'du byed sna tshogs kyi bskyod na'ang g.yengs bar 'gyur la /
NK121(ko)002:5689: rang gi nye bar len pa'i 'du byed bkag na'ang
NK121(ko)002:5690: sems nyid kyang 'gag pa'am ma 'gag pa la thug
NK121(ko)002:5691: par 'gyur bas / de bas na 'du byed gzhan bkag la rang gi 'du byed mi bkag go //
NK121(ko)002:5692: gsum pa ni dran pa snga ma'i steng du phyi ma rtag tu 'bab pa yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5693: dper na chu'i thigs pa bzhin no //
NK121(ko)002:5694: 'di ni dmigs pa gcig las su rung yang /
NK121(ko)002:5695: bsam gtan gyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa'i thabs med de sgribs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5696: lhag mthong gi sgrib pa gsum la /
NK121(ko)002:5697: 'dzin chags dbang gis 'gog pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5698: chos bdag med par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang bral bas /
NK121(ko)002:5699: bsam gtan gyi yul ci snang yang 'dzin chags dang ma bral bas /
NK121(ko)002:5701: yod med dbang gis nyams pa zhes bya ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5702: chos rten cing 'brel te 'byung ba la rmongs pas /
NK121(ko)002:5703: ji ltar bsams kyang yod med kyi mthar lhung ste /
NK121(ko)002:5704: ye shes nyams par gyur pa ste sgrib pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5705: shes rgya chung bas 'khor ba zhes bya ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5706: mnyan bsam gyi shes rab rgya chung bas bsam gtan gyi yul gang la 'jug ma shes te /
NK121(ko)002:5707: bya mun pa la rdugs pa bzhin du sems 'khor zhing 'tshoms pa ste sgrib pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5708: 'di dag ni dngos su sgrib pa yin yang zhi
NK121(ko)002:5709: gnas dang lhag mthong skye ba nyid la gegs su
NK121(ko)002:5710: gyur pas / nyes skyon che ba'i phyi bsam gtan gyi skyon drug ces bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5711: de la rnam rtog g.yeng ba'i skyon 'ba' zhig la yang skyon lnga gsungs te /
NK121(ko)002:5713: rtog pa rags pa'i ri bo dang //
NK121(ko)002:5714: mtshan ma rgyu ba tshor ba dang //
NK121(ko)002:5715: byung tshor skyon lnga spang bar bya //
NK121(ko)002:5716: rtog pa rags dang 'phra ba gnyis //
NK121(ko)002:5717: mtshan ma che dang chung ba gnyis //
NK121(ko)002:5718: rgyu ba ring po thung ngu gnyis //
NK121(ko)002:5719: de bzhin tshor ba gsal mi gsal //
NK121(ko)002:5720: byung tshor gnyis su snang ba'ang //
NK121(ko)002:5721: myur ba dang ni bul ba'o //
NK121(ko)002:5723: 'di rnams rtog pa'i bye brag tu 'dra yang /
NK121(ko)002:5724: phra rags kyi bye brag dang rnam pa'i bye brag gis khyad par dbye ste /
NK121(ko)002:5725: de la rnam pa'i bye brag ni /
NK121(ko)002:5726: rtog pa ni don gyi dngos po tshol bas phye /
NK121(ko)002:5727: mtshan ma ni zhen cing 'dzin pas phye /
NK121(ko)002:5728: rgyu ba ni rgyun gyis phye /
NK121(ko)002:5729: tshor ba ni nyams su myong bas phye /
NK121(ko)002:5731: phra rags ni go rim dang bye brag gnyis brjod pa dag yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5732: spyir bsdu na phra ba'ang rnam pa gnyis yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5735: rags pa'ang rnam pa gnyis yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5738: de la mkhas pa rnams kyi blo ni skye ba rags la 'dzin pa phra ste /
NK121(ko)002:5740: shes bya thams cad la rtog cing 'jug la /
NK121(ko)002:5742: de la dngos po dang mtshan mar zhen pa med do //
NK121(ko)002:5743: blun po rnams kyi blo ni skye ba phra la 'dzin pa rags te /
NK121(ko)002:5745: shes bya rnams la rtogs shing 'jug mi nus la /
NK121(ko)002:5747: dngos por 'dzin cing zhen pa dang mi 'bral lo //
NK121(ko)002:5748: de bas na rnam par mi rtog pa sgom pa'i tshe /
NK121(ko)002:5749: skye ba 'phra la 'dzin pa rags pa'i sems ni thar pa'i lam ma yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5750: 'du shes med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang cha mthun pas lam gyi sgrib pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5751: de bas na dang por skye ba rags la 'dzin
NK121(ko)002:5752: pa phra ba'i sems las goms pa klong du gyur
NK121(ko)002:5753: cing 'dzin pa phra ba'i mthus skye ba nyid kyang
NK121(ko)002:5754: je phra je phrar gyur nas /
NK121(ko)002:5755: tha ma rtog pa'i rnam pa lnga po 'di dang bral la /
NK121(ko)002:5756: sems rang rig pa ni ma 'gags na bden pa mthong ba zhes bya /
NK121(ko)002:5757: 'di rnams yul du 'dzin pa'i rtog pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5758: yul 'dzin pa 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis kyi sgo nas khad kyis zhi bar tshor na /
NK121(ko)002:5759: sems kyi drod thob par gzung ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5760: gang gi tshe 'dzin pa phra bar ma tshor ba'i
NK121(ko)002:5761: skye ba phra bar tshor ba ni lam gyi drod
NK121(ko)002:5763: de la lam gyi sgrib pa dgu la /
NK121(ko)002:5764: bsam gtan mi g.yo ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:5767: yang dag pa'i rtsol ba la sgrib pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5768: 'di ltar mi g.yo na'ang lam snga ma mi gtong zhing /
NK121(ko)002:5769: lam gzhan thob par mi rtsol te /
NK121(ko)002:5770: tshang na gnas pa'i bye'u phrug lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:5771: de bzhin du lam ni thib na'ang mi rtsal te /
NK121(ko)002:5773: shin tu gsal bar gyur na'ang mi rtsol te /
NK121(ko)002:5774: yul gsal bas dbang po'i blo gzung ba lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:5775: sems la shes pa mang po skye bar 'dod pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5776: mngon par shes pa thob par 'dod pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5777: mtshan ma'i rdzu 'phrul 'byin par 'dod pa gsum ni /
NK121(ko)002:5778: yang dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la sgrib pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5779: dper na khyim bdag gis mar gyi snying po 'dod pa'i phyir ba bzhon mang po bsten pa las /
NK121(ko)002:5780: de'i 'o ma dang zho'i longs spyod la chags pa gyur na /
NK121(ko)002:5781: mar gyi snying po la sgribs par gyur pa lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:5782: 'di bdag gi las bla 'am gang na gzhan med pa'i chos thob bo snyam pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5783: rang gi lta ba la'ang bsnyems pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5784: gzhan gyi lta ba la khyad du gsod pa gsum ni /
NK121(ko)002:5785: yang dag pa'i dran pa la sgrib ste /
NK121(ko)002:5786: 'di ltar yang dag pa'i dran pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5787: nges pa'i don gyi mdo'i don dang /
NK121(ko)002:5788: dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag ma brjed par srung ba yin na /
NK121(ko)002:5789: sgrib pa 'di rnams yod na de dag yal bar 'dor te /
NK121(ko)002:5790: dper na rgyal po'am blon po'i bu gzhon nu rgyags pas myos pa dag /
NK121(ko)002:5791: dam pa rnams kyi gdams ngag yid la mi byed pa bzhin no //
NK121(ko)002:5792: bcu pa ni rang bzhin gyi sgrib pa yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5793: chos spyod rnam bcu shing leb kyi ngos ltar gcig la gcig sgrib par gyur pas /
NK121(ko)002:5794: de bas na bsam gtan la sogs pa don chen po la gnas pa rnams kyis /
NK121(ko)002:5795: yi ge 'dri ba la sogs pa don chung ngu'i chos spyod mi spyad do //
NK121(ko)002:5797: don 'di rnams kyis kyang bsam gtan gyi sgrib skyon
NK121(ko)002:5798: mtha' dag bsal te thar pa'i lam la 'jug par
NK121(ko)002:5800: de la nyes pa lnga spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:5805: mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5807: de la le los ni dam pa'i lung mi nyan cing mi 'jug go //
NK121(ko)002:5808: dmigs pa brjed pas ni bsam pa nyams te thos pa rnams kyang dran pa med par byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5809: zhum rgod kyis ni don la goms par byed pa'i blo 'jug tu mi ster ro //
NK121(ko)002:5810: mngon par 'du mi byed pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5812: zhi gnas dang lhag mthong zung du 'brel ba'i gegs byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5813: de la spong ba'i 'du byed brgyad ni /
NK121(ko)002:5817: shin tu sbyangs pa bzhis ni /
NK121(ko)002:5819: dran pas ni dmigs pa brjed pa spong ba'o //
NK121(ko)002:5820: shes bzhin gyis ni zhum rgod spong ngo //
NK121(ko)002:5821: sems pas ni mngon par 'du mi byed drags na gzeng bstod par byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5822: btang snyoms kyis ni mngon par 'du byed drags na 'go gnon par byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5823: de nas zhi gnas dang lhag mthong cha mnyam par
NK121(ko)002:5824: tshor na lhag par gnyen po bsten pa'i rtsol ba
NK121(ko)002:5825: mi skyed do // btang snyoms su bag yangs su bzhag ste /
NK121(ko)002:5826: don la goms par byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5829: de la bzung btags bkag phye bcom pa dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:5832: rkun mo byi la btags byas te //
NK121(ko)002:5833: khang stong phad phung kun bshig nas //
NK121(ko)002:5834: gser khung skar khung kun bkag ste //
NK121(ko)002:5835: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye na //
NK121(ko)002:5836: de dag rtag tu sangs rgyas yin //
NK121(ko)002:5838: de la gtogs 'dod spre'u gzung ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5839: phung po dang khams dang skye mched kyi chos las gzung bar 'os pa gzung ba ste /
NK121(ko)002:5840: 'di ltar yid kyi rnam par shes pa spre'u'i gtogs 'dod ltar /
NK121(ko)002:5841: rigs pa dang ldan pa'i don la ni ched du gtad kyang 'jug par mi nus /
NK121(ko)002:5842: rigs pa dang mi ldan pa'i don la ni skul ba med par rang zhugs byed de /
NK121(ko)002:5843: rtag tu don med pa 'phyan pa 'di /
NK121(ko)002:5844: shes bzhin dran pa'i snod du bcug ste /
NK121(ko)002:5845: gzhan du mi g.yo bar bsdam dgos so //
NK121(ko)002:5846: rkun mo byi la gdags pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5847: de bzhin du chos rnams las gdags par 'os pa gdags pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5848: dper na byi la ni shin tu dal zhing 'jam pa'i spyod pas /
NK121(ko)002:5849: gzhan gyis ma tshor bar gzhan gyi srog rku bar byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5850: de bzhin du nyon mongs pa can gyi yid ni /
NK121(ko)002:5851: shin tu rgyu ba phra ba'i tshul gyis kun gzhi
NK121(ko)002:5852: la kha nang du bltas te bdag tu rlom sems
NK121(ko)002:5853: pas / de'i dbang gis yid kyi rnam par shes
NK121(ko)002:5854: pa'ang 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang mtshungs par ldan
NK121(ko)002:5855: pas / par skye ste / thams cad zag pa dang bcas par byin gyis rlob par byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5856: de bas na 'di chos thams cad la bdag med
NK121(ko)002:5857: par rtogs pa 'i shes rab kyi gzungs kyis ma
NK121(ko)002:5858: btags na / nam yang thar pa'i go skabs mi 'byed do //
NK121(ko)002:5859: 'di ni lhag mthong spyod pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5860: snga ma ni zhi gnas spyod pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5861: khang stong phang phung bshig pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5862: phung po dang skye mched kyi grong stong bshig pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5863: 'di rnams la bdag po med pas grong stong yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5864: rang gi ngo bo yang ma grub par bshig pas
NK121(ko)002:5865: grong stong nyid kyang med de nam mkha' lta bur
NK121(ko)002:5866: rtogs par bya'o // 'di yang lhag mthong spyod pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5867: gseb khung skar khung dgag pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:5868: sgo lnga'i rnam par shes pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5869: dbang lnga'i skar khung nas byung nas yul la rang
NK121(ko)002:5870: bzhin gyis g.yeng ba 'di dag yid nang du bsdus
NK121(ko)002:5873: 'di yang zhi gnas spyod pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5874: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye zhes bya ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5875: kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid la mkhas par byas pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:5876: dper na rgyal po'i mdzod na nor bu rin po
NK121(ko)002:5877: che la sogs pa nor rin thang med pa'ang yod
NK121(ko)002:5878: la / dug la sogs pa dman pa'i rdzas kyang yod do //
NK121(ko)002:5879: de bzhin du kun gzhi rnam par shes pa ni zag pa dang bcas pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5880: zag pa med pa'i chos thams cad kyi mdzod yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5881: shes bya thams cad kyi gnas yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5882: de yang theg pa 'og ma pa'i tshul gyis /
NK121(ko)002:5883: kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i
NK121(ko)002:5884: chos thams cad kyi rgyu dang 'bras bu'i ngo bor
NK121(ko)002:5885: gnas shing smin pa yin pas /
NK121(ko)002:5886: shing thog smin pa dang 'dra la /
NK121(ko)002:5887: zag pa med pa rnams kyi rten dang gnas tsam yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5888: dug gi bum pa'i nang na sman gnas pa lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:5890: theg pa gong ma'i tshul las ni /
NK121(ko)002:5891: kun gzhi'i mtshan nyid ni gdod ma nas byang chub
NK121(ko)002:5892: kyi snying po'i rang bzhin du dag pa yin pas
NK121(ko)002:5893: kun gzhi byang chub kyi sems zhes bya la /
NK121(ko)002:5894: nyon mongs pa dang gnas ngan len gyi bag chags ni glo bur gyi dri ma ste /
NK121(ko)002:5896: nor bu rin po che 'dam du bsubs pa bzhin yon tan cung zad mi snang bar zad de /
NK121(ko)002:5897: rang bzhin nyams par byas pa med do //
NK121(ko)002:5900: sgron ma 'bar ba'i rin chen ni /
NK121(ko)002:5902: de nyid yon tan rang snang bas //
NK121(ko)002:5903: 'od ni mkha' la gsal ba yin //
NK121(ko)002:5904: de bzhin sems nyid rin po che //
NK121(ko)002:5906: de nyid rang bzhin 'od gsal bas //
NK121(ko)002:5907: shes rab chos nyid mkha' la gsal //
NK121(ko)002:5908: zhes gsungs lta bu yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5909: mdor na gang ltar yang rung ste dkar nag gi
NK121(ko)002:5910: chos thams cad kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'i snang
NK121(ko)002:5912: snang ba de'ang 'du byed kyi bag chags kyi dbang gis snang ba yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5913: ji ltar snang ba de bzhin yod pa ma yin pas /
NK121(ko)002:5914: chos thams cad rang bzhin gyi mya ngan las 'das par rtogs na /
NK121(ko)002:5915: rgyal po'i dkor mdzod kha phye ba yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5916: de'i tshe spre'u yang bzung ba yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5917: byi la yang btags pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5918: khang stong yang bshig pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5919: skar khung yang khegs pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5920: 'di lta bu'i blo dang ldan na sangs rgyas kyi lam gzhan nas btsal mi dgos so //
NK121(ko)002:5922: de la sems gdul bar dka' ba'i chos drug gdul ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5925: sems ni glog dang rlung dang spre'u dang mtshungs //
NK121(ko)002:5926: rgya mtsho chen po yi ni rlabs dang 'dra //
NK121(ko)002:5927: sgyu can rtag tu yul la mngon dga' ba //
NK121(ko)002:5928: g.yo zhing 'phyan pa'i sems ni gdul bar bya //
NK121(ko)002:5930: sems ni glog dang 'dra ste skad cig tsam gsal /
NK121(ko)002:5931: rgyun du gsal bar mi gnas pa yin /
NK121(ko)002:5932: rlung dang 'dra ste ngo bo nyid kyis gnas pa'i chos med de /
NK121(ko)002:5933: g.yo zhing rnam par g.yeng ba'i mtshan nyid can yin /
NK121(ko)002:5934: spre'u dang 'dra ste bya ba la mi 'jug cing /
NK121(ko)002:5935: bya ba ma yin pa la 'jug pa'i las can yin /
NK121(ko)002:5936: rgya mtsho chen po'i rlabs dang 'dra ste /
NK121(ko)002:5937: rnam par rtog pa mi zad pa yin /
NK121(ko)002:5938: sgyu can yin te rtag tu yang dag pa ma yin pa'i don bsten pa yin /
NK121(ko)002:5939: rtag tu yul la mngon par dga' ba yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5940: nang du yang dag 'jog la mi dga' ba yin /
NK121(ko)002:5941: de lta bu rang bzhin gyis gdul bar dka' ba de /
NK121(ko)002:5942: bzlas brjod dang bsam gtan gyis brtul te thar pa'i lam la sbyar ro //
NK121(ko)002:5944: de la gdul ba'i thabs kyang mdor bsdu na rnam pa gnyis yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5945: a nu gra ha zhes bya ba rjes su mthun pas gzung ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:5946: bi gra ha zhes bya ba bzlog ste gzung ba'am tshar bcad pas gzung ba gnyis so //
NK121(ko)002:5947: de la rjes su mthun pas gzung ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5948: glog cung zad gsal ba bzhin du bsam gtan gyi
NK121(ko)002:5949: yul la dang po cung zad tsam gzhag ste yun
NK121(ko)002:5951: rlung ltar 'du byed sna tshogs kyi sgo nas 'jug par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5952: spre'u ltar mthun mthun la 'jug par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5953: rgya mtsho ltar rtog pa sna tshogs dang mthun par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5954: sgyu can ltar yang dag pa ma yin pa'ang gdul ba'i skabs su bsten par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:5955: yul la mngon par dga' ba bzhin du 'dod pa'i yul la'ang gtad do //
NK121(ko)002:5957: glog las bzlog ste yun ring du'ang gsal bar gzung /
NK121(ko)002:5958: rlung las bzlog ste mi g.yo bar yang bya /
NK121(ko)002:5959: spre'u las bzlog ste bya ba'i don la gtad /
NK121(ko)002:5960: rgya mtsho las bzlog ste rtog pa'i rlabs zhi bar bya /
NK121(ko)002:5961: sgyu can las bzlog ste yang dag pa'i don la brtag /
NK121(ko)002:5962: yul la mngon par dga' ba las bzlog ste /
NK121(ko)002:5963: nang du yang dag 'jog la gzhag go //
NK121(ko)002:5964: mdor na sems tha mal pa'i chos lugs dang rjes su mthun pas gdul ba'i thabs 'di la /
NK121(ko)002:5965: thabs 'di dang 'di zhes ris su chad pa med de /
NK121(ko)002:5966: sems kyi 'du byed ji ltar 'phro zhing gang la 'jug pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5967: ji snyed du 'jug pa de dag thams cad kyi
NK121(ko)002:5968: rjes su bsam gtan gyi yul gang yang rung ba
NK121(ko)002:5969: zhig rjes su mthun par bsam pas /
NK121(ko)002:5970: mtha' rtog pa nyid kyang bsam gtan gyi yul las
NK121(ko)002:5971: 'das nas gzhan du 'gro ba'i sa gnas mi rnyed
NK121(ko)002:5972: do // 'di ni phal cher zhi gnas spyod pa'i dbang du gsungs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:5973: de la rnal 'byor gyi yan lag drug dang ldan pa'i ting nge 'dzin ni /
NK121(ko)002:5976: so sor spong dang bsam gtan dang //
NK121(ko)002:5977: dbugs dgag gtong dang gzung ba dang //
NK121(ko)002:5978: rjes su dran dang ting 'dzin ni //
NK121(ko)002:5979: sbyor ba'i yan lag drug ces bya //
NK121(ko)002:5981: de la nang sems kyi rnal 'byor 'thob pa'i yan lag 'di drug yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5982: de la so sor spong ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:5983: sdom pa la gnas pa yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5984: ji ltar tshul khrims rnam par dag pa 'dod pas
NK121(ko)002:5985: g.yeng ba med cing 'gyod pa'i dri ma med pas
NK121(ko)002:5986: rtag tu dbang po bsdams pa'i pa'i phyir /
NK121(ko)002:5987: ting nge 'dzin 'thob pa 'i rgyu yin pa de bzhin du /
NK121(ko)002:5988: so sor spong ba zhes bya ba 'di yang yul
NK121(ko)002:5989: dang dbang po'i sgo nas rnam par shes pa skye
NK121(ko)002:5990: ba thams cad skyon du bltas te spang bar bya
NK121(ko)002:5991: ba'ang ma yin / dngos por bltas te mtshan ma'i rjes su 'brang ba'ang ma yin te /
NK121(ko)002:5992: rtag tu rang gi lha'i bdag nyid du bltas te
NK121(ko)002:5993: spyad par bya la dngos por zhen pa dang dgag
NK121(ko)002:5994: pa gnyis spang bar bya ba 'di ni /
NK121(ko)002:5995: dbang po rang bzhin gyis bsdams shing /
NK121(ko)002:5996: 'dod pa bkag pa'i gdung bas kyang ma zin pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:5997: rgyal ba'i byin rlabs kyang nye bar 'gyur bas /
NK121(ko)002:5998: bsam gtan gyi snod du 'gyur ba yin no //
NK121(ko)002:5999: 'di la so sor spyod pa zhes kyang bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:6001: so sor spong ba zhes kyang bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:6002: 'dod pas g.yeng bar 'gyur ba spong ngo //
NK121(ko)002:6004: 'dod pa dang sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las dben pa las skyes pa yin pas /
NK121(ko)002:6005: de'i 'og tu bsam gtan bstan par rigs so //
NK121(ko)002:6006: de yang yan lag rnam pa lnga ste /
NK121(ko)002:6010: sems rtse gcig pa dang lnga'o //
NK121(ko)002:6011: bsam gtan gyi yul yang 'di'i skabs su gsang ba gsum nyid yin te /
NK121(ko)002:6012: gsang ba gsum gyis ni phyag rgya thams cad bsdus so //
NK121(ko)002:6013: phyag rgyas ni yongs su dag pa'i lha thams cad kyang don dang rtags kyi tshul gyis bsdus so //
NK121(ko)002:6014: de la gsang ba gsum las /
NK121(ko)002:6016: lha'i gzugs kyi sku kha dog dang dbyibs dang g.yo ba'i bye brag /'di skad du /
NK121(ko)002:6018: smin ma mig dang so dang mchu //
NK121(ko)002:6019: bzhin dang lus dang rkang lag gis //
NK121(ko)002:6020: rdo rje sems dpa' dpal gyi rgya //
NK121(ko)002:6021: rang don las rnams sgrub byed pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6023: sku'i tshul thams cad kyi sgo nas /
NK121(ko)002:6024: bsam gtan gyi yul du dmigs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6026: sgra dang sgra min rnam dpyad pa //
NK121(ko)002:6027: nga ro sbas pa rdo rje'i gsung //
NK121(ko)002:6028: zhes bya ba la sogs pa gsungs pa ltar /
NK121(ko)002:6029: lha'i thugs ka dang ljags stengs su chos kyi yi
NK121(ko)002:6030: ge kha dog dang dbyibs kyi mtshan mar bsam pa
NK121(ko)002:6031: dang / de yang sgra dang sgra'i don gyi chos
NK121(ko)002:6032: nyid dang bcas par brtag cing dpyad pa ni bsam
NK121(ko)002:6033: gtan thob pa'i rgyu yin te /
NK121(ko)002:6035: sgra la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni rnal 'byor thob par byed pa yin la /
NK121(ko)002:6036: sgra'i mtha' la gnas pa'i bsam gtan ni thar pa ster bar byed par gsungs pa dang 'dra'o //
NK121(ko)002:6037: ngag sgra grags par brjod pa ni bsam gtan gtsor smos pa'i skabs 'dir g.yeng ba'i rgyur 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6039: thugs kar sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgom pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6040: ye shes sems dpa' lta bur bsgom pa ni thugs kyi mtshan ma /
NK121(ko)002:6041: de'i don byang chub kyi sems dang chos kyi skur
NK121(ko)002:6042: gnas pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dpyad pa ni thugs
NK121(ko)002:6044: de ltar gsang ba gsum la dmigs pa ni bsam gtan gyi yul lo //
NK121(ko)002:6045: de la dmigs par byed pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:6046: yan lag lnga'i tshul gyis dmigs par byed de /
NK121(ko)002:6047: de la rtog pa ni gsang ba gsum gyi mtshan
NK121(ko)002:6048: nyid ji lta ba bzhin du rtog pa'i blo skye
NK121(ko)002:6049: ba'o // dpyod pa ni de nyid la blo yang dang yang du sbyong zhing /
NK121(ko)002:6050: de'i don dang bcas pa la dpyod pa yang dang yang 'jug pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6051: dga' ba ni rtog dpyod gnyis kyi bsam gtan thob
NK121(ko)002:6052: pas gsang ba gsum gyi 'dra snang gi rnam pa
NK121(ko)002:6054: de'i tshe 'dod pas dben par gyur pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6055: sngar ma myong ba'i don nyams su myong bas thun
NK121(ko)002:6056: mong ma yin pa'i dga' ba rlabs po che skye'o
NK121(ko)002:6057: // bde ba ni de'i dbang gi sems bsdus pa
NK121(ko)002:6058: thob pa na lus dang sems kyi tshor ba bde
NK121(ko)002:6059: ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6060: sems rtse gcig pa ni de ltar sems shin tu bsdus par gyur pa las /
NK121(ko)002:6061: shes pa dang shes bya gnyis su snang bar mi skye ste /
NK121(ko)002:6062: rang rig pa tsam du gyur pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6063: de ltar bsam gtan gyis sems zhi bar byas pa la /
NK121(ko)002:6064: de shin tu dul bar bya ba'i phyir dbugs dgag cing gtong ba la bslab par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:6065: de la ji ltar bslab pa'i thabs ni sgo mang bas gang ltar bslabs kyang 'gal ba med do //
NK121(ko)002:6066: de nas sems dul zhing dbugs zhi nas /
NK121(ko)002:6067: brtan zhing stobs dang ldan par bya ba'i phyir /
NK121(ko)002:6068: dbugs nang du gzung ba la bslab par bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:6069: de nas dbugs zin te sems kyang shin tu zhi bar gyur nas brtan pa thob pa na /
NK121(ko)002:6070: mtshan ma rnam pa lnga 'byung bar 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:6072: dang po smigs rgyu 'dra ba dang //
NK121(ko)002:6073: gnyis pa la ni du ba'i tshul //
NK121(ko)002:6074: gsum pa srin bu me khyer 'dra //
NK121(ko)002:6075: bzhi pa mar me bzhin du 'bar //
NK121(ko)002:6076: lnga pa rtag tu snang ba ni //
NK121(ko)002:6077: sprin med pa yi nam mkha' bzhin //
NK121(ko)002:6079: de la rtags 'di yang phyi nang rnam pa gnyis te /
NK121(ko)002:6080: de la phyi'i rtags ni dbugs nang du zin par gyur pa na /
NK121(ko)002:6081: phyi rol du mdun gyi nam mkha' la mig lam du 'od snang bar 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:6082: de yang dang po dbugs brtan par zin nas nam
NK121(ko)002:6083: mkha' la yun ring du brtan par bltas pa na
NK121(ko)002:6085: du ba'i rnam pa smigs rgyu'i rnam pa 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6086: de brtan par gyur nas du ba 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6087: de brtan par gyur nas srin bu me khyer gyi 'od 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6088: de brtan par gyur nas mar me'i 'od 'dra ba mthong bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6089: de brtan par gyur nas srin med pa'i nam mkha' bzhin du thams cad gsal bar 'gyur te /
NK121(ko)002:6091: 'di ni nyin par gyi dbang du gsungs pa yin te /
NK121(ko)002:6092: mtshan mo bltas na ni thams cad du me'i 'od
NK121(ko)002:6093: 'dra ba rim gyis rgyas par mthong bar 'gyur ro
NK121(ko)002:6094: // nang gi rtags ni sems je zhi je gsal gyur pa nyid dang sbyar ro //
NK121(ko)002:6095: de ltar brtan pa'i rtags thob nas /
NK121(ko)002:6096: sems shin tu sbyangs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir /
NK121(ko)002:6097: rjes su dran pa bsgom par bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:6098: steng 'og gi sgo gang rung zhig nas gsang ba
NK121(ko)002:6099: gsum gyi rnam pa'i 'od zer gyi spro bsdu rgya
NK121(ko)002:6100: che chung dang grangs mang nyung gis sems kyi rtsal
NK121(ko)002:6101: sbyang bar bya'o // de ltar rtsa 'byongs nas ting nge 'dzin la bslab pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:6102: gong ma ltar rtsal 'byongs pa'i shugs kyis ye shes rang rig pa thob ste /
NK121(ko)002:6103: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes mngon du gyur
NK121(ko)002:6104: te sgrib pa'i d+r+wa ba thams cad gcod par 'gyur
NK121(ko)002:6105: ro // yan lag gzhan gyi yon tan ni /
NK121(ko)002:6106: so sor sbyang pas bder gshegs rnams dgongs par 'gyur /
NK121(ko)002:6107: bsam gtan thob pa las mngon par shes pa 'thob bo //
NK121(ko)002:6108: dbugs dang dbang du gyur pa las 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ngo //
NK121(ko)002:6109: de lus dang sems dang lha la dmigs pa'i tshul gang zhe na /
NK121(ko)002:6110: lus la dmigs pa ni dbugs kyi sgo nas dmigs te /
NK121(ko)002:6120: de la dbugs kyi rang bzhin ni /
NK121(ko)002:6121: lus nyid khams lnga'i rang bzhin du gnas pas /
NK121(ko)002:6122: dbugs kyi rang bzhin khams lnga'i rang bzhin yin te /
NK121(ko)002:6123: de la sa'i dbugs ni sra zhing lci'o //
NK121(ko)002:6124: chu'i dbugs ni dal zhing 'jam mo //
NK121(ko)002:6125: me'i dbugs ni yang zhing dro'o /
NK121(ko)002:6126: rlung gi dbugs ni yang zhing rtsub bo //
NK121(ko)002:6127: nam mkha'i dbugs ni phra zhing rgyu ba mi tshor ro //
NK121(ko)002:6128: dbugs kyi gnas ni snying khong stong dang /
NK121(ko)002:6130: dbugs kyi yul ni nang du lus kun la yang khyab par rgyu na /
NK121(ko)002:6131: shas cher lte ba yan chad nas /
NK121(ko)002:6132: phyi rol gyi sor bcu drug tshun chad do //
NK121(ko)002:6133: dbugs kyi lam ni gtsor mgrin pa'i gsang nas sna'i bu ga'o //
NK121(ko)002:6134: dbugs kyi las ni gnyis te /
NK121(ko)002:6137: de la 'dzin pa'i las ni reg pas lus la phan 'dogs shing /
NK121(ko)002:6139: sems kyi bzhon pa byed cing sems kyang 'dzin par byed de /
NK121(ko)002:6140: lus sems gnyis ga 'dzin par byed pas srog 'dzin pa'i las byed ces bya /
NK121(ko)002:6142: g.yo ba'i tshe lus sems gnyis ga yang g.yo bar byed /
NK121(ko)002:6143: mi g.yo ba'i tshe gnyi' ga yang mi g.yo bar byed do //
NK121(ko)002:6144: dbugs la dmigs pa'i thabs ni sgo mang ste /
NK121(ko)002:6145: gang ltar yang 'gal ba med do //
NK121(ko)002:6146: mdor bsdu na dbugs kyi chos dang mthun par dmigs pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6147: chos la ma brten par dmigs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6149: g.yas nas rgyu ba me dang rlung gi khams //
NK121(ko)002:6150: g.yon nas rgyu ba sa dang chu yi khams //
NK121(ko)002:6151: dbus nas rgyu ba nam mkha'i khams //
NK121(ko)002:6154: g.yas g.yon re re la'ang khams lnga lnga tshang bar rgyu ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:6156: g.yas g.yon re re la'ang 'byung ba re re'i shas su bstan pa dag gi sgo nas /
NK121(ko)002:6160: rnam pa'i sgo nas so sor phye nas dmigs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6164: sku phra mo lta bu'i rnam par dmigs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6165: chos la ma rten pa ni bye brag so sor phye ba med par /
NK121(ko)002:6166: dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba tsam la dmigs te /
NK121(ko)002:6167: mtshan ma'i rnam pa gang yang rung ba gcig la dmigs pa'am /
NK121(ko)002:6168: reg bya tsam la dmigs kyang rung ste /
NK121(ko)002:6169: sems ma yeng bar gtad pa 'ba' zhig tsam gyis kyang chog go //
NK121(ko)002:6170: spyir grags pa'i kha dog dang bong tshod kyi skyon dang yon tan ni /
NK121(ko)002:6171: khams rnams ni gdugs pa'i mtshan nyid yin pas /
NK121(ko)002:6172: basamagatana gyi yul dmigs pa tsam la'ang mthu brtas pa'i dus na /
NK121(ko)002:6173: skyon dang yon tan yod de /
NK121(ko)002:6174: de la kha dog dkar po ni gdug pa zhi bar byed pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK121(ko)002:6175: ser po ni gdugs pa 'dzin pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK121(ko)002:6176: dmar po ni gdugs pa mched pa'i mtshan nyid /
NK121(ko)002:6177: nag po ni gdugs pa slong ba'i mtshan nyid ces 'byung /
NK121(ko)002:6178: reg bya dang bong tshod kyang sra zhing sbom pa ltar lus la mi bde ba 'byung /
NK121(ko)002:6179: phra zhing dang la chu zla ltar dngos po'i shas chung bar dmigs na /
NK121(ko)002:6180: lus la mi bde ba mi 'byung ngo //
NK121(ko)002:6182: dbugs la dmigs pa'i yon tan ni /
NK121(ko)002:6187: bde zhing gtsang bar lta ba rnams ldog ste /
NK121(ko)002:6189: sems gnas pa thob pas zhi gnas las su rung bar 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6190: sems la dmigs pa'ang de bzhin sbyar te /
NK121(ko)002:6191: sems kyi rang bzhin ni snang ba'i khams dang /
NK121(ko)002:6193: dngos po so so rnam par rig pa'i khams sems
NK121(ko)002:6194: kyi gnas ni khams lnga pa'i rlung la zhon nas
NK121(ko)002:6195: / khams lnga pa'i lus la gnas so //
NK121(ko)002:6197: snang ba'i yul ni chos thams cad do //
NK121(ko)002:6200: rnam par rig pa'i yul ni phyi'i skye mched rnams so //
NK121(ko)002:6201: sems kyi lam ni dbang po rnams so //
NK121(ko)002:6202: sems kyi las ni gnyis te /
NK121(ko)002:6203: 'dzin pa'i las ni chos thams cad 'dzin par byed do //
NK121(ko)002:6204: byed pa'i las ni dkar nag gi 'du byed thams cad mngon par 'du byed do //
NK121(ko)002:6205: sems la dmigs pa'i thabs ni /
NK121(ko)002:6206: gong du dbugs la dmigs pa las su rung bas /
NK121(ko)002:6207: de nas dran pa dang shes bzhin gyis bzung ste /
NK121(ko)002:6208: sems ji ltar skye ba nyid la dmigs pas sems kyi mtshan nyid khong du chud par 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6212: dngos por lta ba thams cad ldog ste /
NK121(ko)002:6214: sems las su rung bar 'gyur te zhi gnas 'thob bo //
NK121(ko)002:6215: de ltar lus dang sems la dmigs pa las su rung nas /
NK121(ko)002:6216: lha la dmigs par bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:6217: lha la'ang re shig gi mtshan ma lus sems dang mthun par bstan te /
NK121(ko)002:6218: de yang 'di ltar lha'i rang bzhin ni /
NK121(ko)002:6220: rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes dang /
NK121(ko)002:6221: ci yang sa le mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /
NK121(ko)002:6222: 'gro ba 'dul ba'i gzugs kyi sku dang /
NK121(ko)002:6223: so so'i skad du dam pa'i chos ston pa'i gsung ste /
NK121(ko)002:6228: lha'i yul ni chos kyi dbyings dang /
NK121(ko)002:6231: lha'i yongs su gzung ba ni sems can /
NK121(ko)002:6232: sems can gyi skyabs ni lha ste /
NK121(ko)002:6233: 'brel pa gnyis kyi sgo dang lam du gyur pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:6239: 'dzin pa'i las ni yon tan thams cad ldan pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6240: byed pa'i las ni sems can sgrol bar mdzad pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6241: lha la dmigs pa'i thabs ni lus dang sems nyid lhar bsgoms pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:6242: de yang rnal 'byor rnam pa gsum gyi tshul gyis /
NK121(ko)002:6243: byin gyis rlob pa'i tshul lam /
NK121(ko)002:6245: rdzogs pa'i tshul gang yang rung bar bsgom mo //
NK121(ko)002:6247: tshogs rnam pa gnyis dus gcig tu rdzogs par 'gyur ba'o //
NK121(ko)002:6248: de ltar dmigs pa rnam pa gsum la rim gyis bslab cing /
NK121(ko)002:6249: rim gyis par bshad pa 'di ni /
NK121(ko)002:6250: byis pa dang po gzhug pa tsam ste /
NK121(ko)002:6251: dngos su ni lus nyid sems kyi rnam pa yin la /
NK121(ko)002:6252: sems kyi rang bzhin ni lha yin no //
NK121(ko)002:6253: de bas na phyi nang snod bcud kyi chos thams
NK121(ko)002:6254: cad kyi rang gi ngo bo lha nyid du shes
NK121(ko)002:6255: pa ni / dang po lha ngo shes pa yin no //
NK121(ko)002:6256: bar du lha bsgom pa'i thabs shes pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:6257: bsgrub thabs sna tshogs nas gsungs pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6258: gong du bstan pa'i bsam gtan gyi lung sems lon gyis bcos pa'i thabs bstan pa rnams yin no //
NK121(ko)002:6259: tha ma las su rung ba'i tshad bstan pa ni /
NK121(ko)002:6260: mtshan ma med pa'i lha'i tshad ni gong du bstan zin to //
NK121(ko)002:6261: mtshan ma'i lha'i sku bsgoms pa'i tshad ni /
NK121(ko)002:6262: lha'i lung bcur bstan pa'ang yod na /
NK121(ko)002:6266: lhang nge ba dang gsum ste /
NK121(ko)002:6267: de la lham me ni ma brdos pa /
NK121(ko)002:6268: lhan ne ni ma g.yos pa /
NK121(ko)002:6269: lhang nge ni ma bsgribs pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6270: de la ma brdos pa ni snang la rang bzhin med pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:6271: gzugs brnyan nam chu zla lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:6272: ma g.yos pa ni bying rgod kyi zug rngus ma bskyod pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:6273: nor bu rin po che'i 'od lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:6274: ma bsgribs pa ni de gnyis dang ldan pas ma rtogs pa'i sgrib pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6275: mi gsal ba'i sgrib pa gnyis med par shin tu gsal bar snang ba /
NK121(ko)002:6276: dbang pos blta bar mi bzod pa ltar shin tu gsal ba'o //
NK121(ko)002:6277: de dag ni tshul bzhin du slob par 'dod pa rnams kyi dbang du bshad pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6278: gang dag mos pa dang bya bas g.yengs par gyur
NK121(ko)002:6279: cing tshul bzhin du sbyor mi nus pa rnams kyis
NK121(ko)002:6280: ni / rdzogs pa chen po'i don dang /
NK121(ko)002:6281: lha'i rang bzhin ji lta ba yid la bya ste /
NK121(ko)002:6283: cho ga'i rim pas bskyed kyang rung /
NK121(ko)002:6284: skad cig gcig la rdzogs pa'i tshul lam /
NK121(ko)002:6286: mos pa dang nga rgyal gyi sgo nas kyang ma yengs pa'i sems kyi bzung ste /
NK121(ko)002:6287: bzlas brjod dang bsam gtan la 'jug go //
NK121(ko)002:6288: bzlas brjod kyi tshe'ang mdun du lha dmigs kyang rung /
NK121(ko)002:6292: las sam 'bras bu gang la dmigs kyang rung ste /
NK121(ko)002:6293: spyir dmigs pa rtse gcig pas 'bad pa ltar mthu dang byin rlabs che'o //
NK121(ko)002:6294: spyir lha'i de kho na nyid la /
NK121(ko)002:6295: lha drug tu grags pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6299: sems pa'i bye brag gi lha zhes bya ba dang /
NK121(ko)002:6301: dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'i lha zhes spyir grags mod kyi /
NK121(ko)002:6302: phyag rgya'i mtshan ma la lhar grags pa na /
NK121(ko)002:6303: brtag pa rnam pa du ma la 'jug ste /
NK121(ko)002:6304: pha rol tu phyin pa'i lugs /
NK121(ko)002:6305: rnam par smin pa'i lus kyi dbyibs kyi bye brag ces brtag pa dang /
NK121(ko)002:6307: de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi mtshan ma'i gzugs so //
NK121(ko)002:6309: de nyid skye bo byin gyis rlob pa la sogs pa'i nus mthu can no //
NK121(ko)002:6311: de nyid dam tshig can gyi skye bos lhar brtags pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6313: de nyid rnam par smin pa'i gzugs kyi bye brag dang /
NK121(ko)002:6314: ye shes chen po'i byin rlabs gnyis dbyer med par 'dres pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6316: de nyid bdag nyid chen po rnams kyi thugs gsang
NK121(ko)002:6317: ba'i ye shes nyid mtshan ma'i gzugs su sprul pa
NK121(ko)002:6318: ste / chu grang ba'i rkyen gyis chab rom du gyur pa lta bu'o //
NK121(ko)002:6320: chos thams cad lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgya'i rang bzhin yin pa las /
NK121(ko)002:6321: las 'phro dang skal ba'i dbang gis so sor snang ste /
NK121(ko)002:6322: de la shin tu dag pa dul bar gyur pa
NK121(ko)002:6323: rnams la ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur snang ngo
NK121(ko)002:6324: // sems can khengs pa las dag par gyur pa rnams la ni /
NK121(ko)002:6325: sprul pa'i sku rab tu byung ba'i cha lugs su snang ngo //
NK121(ko)002:6326: de'i 'og ma rnams la ni cha shas kyi phyag rgya snang ngo //
NK121(ko)002:6327: de'i 'og ma rnams la ni thun mong gi gzugs la rten pa'i phyag rgya snang ste /
NK121(ko)002:6328: thams cad kyang lhun gyis grub pa'i phyag rgyar bye brag med do //
NK121(ko)002:6330: de la gong ma lnga ni dngos por lta ba'i dbang du bshad pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6331: tha ma gnyis ni dngos por zhen pa dang bral ba'i dbang du bshad pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6332: brtag pa de ltar 'jug kyang yongs su gzung bar bya ba ni /
NK121(ko)002:6333: phyi ma ltar gzung bar bya'o //
NK121(ko)002:6334: mdor na bsam gtan gyi bye brag 'di dag thams cad la'ang /
NK121(ko)002:6335: rdzogs pa chen po'i don gyis zin par byas na thabs mkhas pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6336: ma zin na thabs mi mkhas pa'i spyod par 'gyur ro //
NK121(ko)002:6337: brgyud pa'i thabs bstan pa ste /
NK121(ko)002:6339: chos rnams sgyu ma lta bu zhes //
NK121(ko)002:6340: gsung rab spyi las grags mod kyi //
NK121(ko)002:6341: sgyu ma smigs rgyu la sogs dang //
NK121(ko)002:6342: 'go mnyam nyid du ston byed pa //
NK121(ko)002:6343: nges don rdzogs pa chen po'i tshul //
NK121(ko)002:6344: tshul 'di bsgrub par bya ba la //
NK121(ko)002:6345: brgal lan bcas shing shan dang bcas //
NK121(ko)002:6346: rigs pas gnod med tshul dang bcas //
NK121(ko)002:6347: nges don byang chub sems kyi don //
NK121(ko)002:6348: rang bzhin dang ni che ba dang //
NK121(ko)002:6349: gol sgrib dang ni gzhag thabs kyang //
NK121(ko)002:6350: brgyud thabs bcas par bstan pa lags //
NK121(ko)002:6351: rkyen rnams nye bar gnas bzhin du //
NK121(ko)002:6353: gang du'ang skur pa ma btab pas //
NK121(ko)002:6354: 'di la skur ba'i gnas ma mthong //
NK121(ko)002:6356: snang ba tsam las ma gtogs pa //
NK121(ko)002:6357: rgyu 'bras dngos po mi sgrub pas //
NK121(ko)002:6359: gang gzhan sgro skur bral ba'i don //
NK121(ko)002:6360: tshul gzhan dag gis sgrub byed kyang //
NK121(ko)002:6361: nges don bka' yi rjes 'brangs nas //
NK121(ko)002:6362: don la bdag blo 'di ltar skyes //
NK121(ko)002:6363: theg chen tshul la 'jug pa tsam //
NK121(ko)002:6364: lha sgom don du 'di bgyis te //
NK121(ko)002:6365: theg pa snod du gyur pa yi //
NK121(ko)002:6366: 'gro ba rnams kyis mthong gyur tam //
NK121(ko)002:6367: 'jig rten grags mthun sgrub byed pa'i //
NK121(ko)002:6368: bstan chos rjes su zhugs pa'i blo //
NK121(ko)002:6369: 'dzin bcas rnams kyi mthong yang rung //
NK121(ko)002:6370: theg chen bden pa'i byin rlabs kyis //
NK121(ko)002:6371: blangs dor bral ba'i don rtogs te //
NK121(ko)002:6372: khyung chen nam mkhar lding ba bzhin //
NK121(ko)002:6373: bcings med bskyod pa med bzhin du //
NK121(ko)002:6374: spyi rgya rlabs kyis chod par shog //
NK121(ko)002:6375: theg pa chen pa'i tshul la 'jug pa'i thabs //
NK121(ko)002:6376: 'jug pa'i yan lag dang bcas par bstan pa /
NK121(ko)002:6378: mkhas pa'i dbang po rong zom chen pos so ////
NK121(ko)002:6379: le'u dang po nyon mongs kyi mtshan nyid /
NK121(ko)002:6382: bzhi par rigs pas mi gnod tshul /
NK121(ko)002:6383: lnga par rdzogs pa chen po'i gzhung /
NK121(ko)002:6384: drug par brgyud pa'i thabs bstan pa'o //
NK121(ko)002:6387: sngon dus kun mkhyen mtsho skyes rjes //
NK121(ko)002:6388: srid gsum bdud brtul chos 'khor bskor //
NK121(ko)002:6389: thugs sras rong zom chos rjes kyang //
NK121(ko)002:6390: lha srin dbang bsdud gsang bstan spel /
NK121(ko)002:6392: 1 / gang gi thugs rje'i bka' drin gyis //
NK121(ko)002:6393: phyi rabs bod phrug skal ldan rnams //
NK121(ko)002:6394: theg brgyad spong rtogs mthar phyin nas //
NK121(ko)002:6395: 'od gsal theg rtse'i sa mthor gshegs /
NK121(ko)002:6397: 2 / gang la dad pas rjes 'gro ba //
NK121(ko)002:6398: nged cag lnga bdo'i sems can rnams //
NK121(ko)002:6399: 'brel tshad rnam grol dbugs dbyung phyir //
NK121(ko)002:6400: gsung rab chos sbyin bskrun la gus /
NK121(ko)002:6402: 3 / zhes pa'ang slob dpon rnam gnyis kyi chos brgyud gral
NK121(ko)002:6403: mthar skyes pa pad+ma kun grol nas rnam dkar byed
NK121(ko)002:6404: pa'i mos blo dang 'brel sug bris bgyis pa dge
